sentences.en: A shilling life will give you all the fact.
sentences.cn: 一先令的生命将给出所有事实.

sentences.en: Boats for hire: one shilling an hour.
sentences.cn: 游船出租: 每小时一先令.

sentences.en: England produced Shakespeare; the British Empire the six - shilling novel.
sentences.cn: 英格兰生了莎士比亚; 大英国则生了六先令(一部的)小说.

sentences.en: Every penny was hard earned, and every shilling was kept until I had to spend it.
sentences.cn: 每个便士都那么难挣, 对于每个先令,都是到万不得已时才花掉它.

sentences.en: He gave the boys a shilling apiece.
sentences.cn: 他给男孩子们每人一先令.

sentences.en: I bet people will pay a shilling to see this.
sentences.cn: 我想人们一定愿意花一先令来看它这样子。

sentences.en: I bet you a shilling he has forgotten.
sentences.cn: 他肯定忘掉了.

sentences.en: If I give you a shilling, we shall be all square.
sentences.cn: 我给你一先令, 咱们就两清了.

sentences.en: In former times, 12 pence went to a shilling.
sentences.cn: 过去，十二便士等于一先令。

sentences.en: In the old days you could get a pint of beer for a shilling.
sentences.cn: 从前,花一先令就可以买到一品脱啤酒.

sentences.en: Shilling has been reborn as an artist.
sentences.cn: 希林以艺术家的身份再次出现。

sentences.en: The cost of borrowing abroad is likely to rise , the overvalued kenyan shilling will fall , tourism has already been badly hit and foreign aid may be cut back.
sentences.cn: 从国外的贷款有可能会上升，而估价过高的肯尼亚先令也将贬值，旅游业已经受到重挫，国外援助可能也会减少。

sentences.en: The governor will not give you a shilling to start you in London.
sentences.cn: 老板不会给你一先令让你上伦敦去开业的.

sentences.en: The prominent coin was called the shilling and it was a silver coin.
sentences.cn: 那种著名的硬币名叫先令，并且它是一种银质的硬币。

sentences.en: There are only one shilling and two sixpences in my purse.
sentences.cn: 我的钱包里只有一先令十二便士了.

sentences.en: They cost one shilling each.
sentences.cn: 它们每个价格为一先令.

sentences.en: Walter Scott wanted to give him a six penny piece to reward him for this service; but not finding any in his purse he presented him with a shilling saying, "You will owe me six pence, my good fellow.
sentences.cn: 沃尔特•司各脱想奖赏给他一枚六便士的硬币,但他在钱包里找不到便士,于是他给了他一个先令,说:"你将欠我六便士,我亲爱的朋友.

sentences.en: We wanted this to be a twenty shilling coin but now in the market it's trading at twenty-one.
sentences.cn: 我们希望它是一个值二十先令的硬币,但现在它在市场上以二十一个先令的价值来交换。

sentences.en: Would you please give me - andten - shilling notes , and the rest in small change.
sentences.cn: 请告诉我你要换多少.这些就是:一些法国法郎,瑞士法郎, 美圆和一些荷兰盾.

sentences.en: You can give me three half crowns for this ten - shilling note.
sentences.cn: 你给我3个2先令6便士的银币换这张10先令的钞票.

phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)脑子不灵，反应不快

phrases.phrase: take the King's or Queen's shilling

trans.tran_cn: 先令（英国1971年以前的货币单位，为一镑的二十分之一）
trans.tran_en: an old British coin or unit of money. There were 20 shillings in one pound.
